content: षंडः {@--1@} A bull. {@--2@} A eunuch; (14 or 20 classes of eunuchs are mentioned by different writers). {@--3@} A group, multitude; collection, heap, quantity ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also in this sense); कलस्वमुपगीते षट्पदौघेन धत्तः कुमुदकमलषंडे तुल्यरूपामवस्थां <ls>Śi. 11. 15</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> खंड also. --डः, --डं A flock (of goats &c.).
